6662.quoteText: As part of that service, we place Google Analytics cookies on our site.
6662.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

6663.quoteText: To the extent we possess it, we may disclose personally identifiable information about you to third parties in limited circumstances.
6663.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

6664.title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve your data.
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy has a section where they describe their policies towards law enforcement requests.

6665.quoteText: If we are required by law to disclose the information that you have submitted, we will attempt to provide you with prior notice (unless we are prohibited, or it would be futile) that a request for your information has been made in order to give you an opportunity to object to the disclosure.
6665.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

tosdr.case: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
